definitions.definition: Extreme sensitivity to a substance such as a foreign protein or drug.
A severe and rapid systemic allergic reaction to an allergen , causing a constriction of the trachea , preventing breathing; anaphylactic shock .

main_definition: Extreme sensitivity to a substance such as a foreign protein or drug.
secondary_definitions: A severe and rapid systemic allergic reaction to an allergen , causing a constriction of the trachea , preventing breathing; anaphylactic shock .
